date.TaskDes: 狼患已经让整个村子的村民心生忌惮,唯有将作恶多端的狼王击败，才能使村民内心的恐惧得以慰籍，勇士，上吧，拿出你的能力，勇敢的战胜狼王！
前途的路比较迷茫，魔导师·加尔是一个德高望重的人，先去拜见一下他吧，或许他能够帮助你。
date.TaskDes_EN: The road to the future is rather confused. Magistrix Jarl is a man of high prestige. Go to see him first. Maybe he can help you.

date.TaskDes: 看看周围有没有小树妖,听说他们身上有不错的宝物！
date.TaskDes_EN: Look around to see if there are little dryad. I heard that they have good treasures!

date.TaskDes: 去树林周围逛逛吧，熟悉一下环境，顺便收集一些树皮。
date.TaskDes_EN: Go around the woods, get familiar with the environment, and collect some bark by the way.

date.TaskDes: 前不久有村民发现村里出现了软泥怪，很多村民都因此受伤，快去帮大家清除它们！
date.TaskDes_EN: A few days ago, some villagers found out that there were mud monsters in the village. Many villagers were injured because of this. Go and help them to clear them!

date.TaskDes: 收集击败软泥怪留下来的罪证软泥液，说不定以后能用上。
date.TaskDes_EN: Collect the evidence of killing the ooze left by the ooze monster. Maybe it can be used later.

date.TaskDes: 在这矿洞里到处都藏着一些矿石，赶快去收集一些备用吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: There are some ores everywhere in this mine cave. Hurry to collect some for backup.

date.TaskDes: 这附近怪物还真不少，打败它们还能得到奇异碎片哦
date.TaskDes_EN: There are many monsters around here. Defeat them and you will get strange pieces

date.TaskDes: 别偷懒！多去练练手，通过击败一些怪物将等级提升至5级。
date.TaskDes_EN: Don't be lazy! Practice more hands. Kill some monsters to raise the level to level 5.

date.TaskDes: 糟糕！遇到一些森林白狼，先去打败他们，为前方开路。
date.TaskDes_EN: Terrible! Meet some timber wolf, defeat them first, and open the way for the front.

date.TaskDes: 狼虽有害，但狼皮可是个好东西，捡起掉落的狼皮吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: Although wolf is harmful, wolf blood is a good thing. Pick up the fallen wolf blood.

date.TaskDes: 森林的深处有一只狼王，十分凶恶，快去帮魔导师打败它，听说它身上藏着宝物呢。
date.TaskDes_EN: There is a red wolf in the depths of the forest. It is very fierce. Go and help the magister to defeat it. I heard that it contains treasures.

date.TaskDes: 前方不远处好像有一个奇怪的人，你过去看看，说不定会有意外的收获。
date.TaskDes_EN: There seems to be a strange person not far away in front of you. If you look over in the past, there may be unexpected gains.

date.TaskDes: 有缘千里来相会，把奇异碎片交给旅行者吧，他游历四方，或许他也能给你点什么好东西呢。
date.TaskDes_EN: Come to meet for thousands of miles, give the stranger to the traveler, he travels around, maybe he can give you something good.

date.TaskDes: 探险的路途漫漫，多储备一些木材总是没有坏处的。
date.TaskDes_EN: The adventure is long, and there is always no harm in storing more wood.

date.TaskDes: 等级提升至8级后，开启后续主线任务。
date.TaskDes_EN: After upgrading to 8 levels, the main tasks will be opened.

date.TaskDes: 把打败“怪兽”的好消息告诉旅行者，让他见识一下你的厉害！
date.TaskDes_EN: Tell the traveler the good news of defeating the monster and let him see how powerful you are!

date.TaskDes: 击败森林里这些凶恶的野狗，它们太坏了，总是喜欢乱咬人。
date.TaskDes_EN: Kill the forest these wild dogs, they too bad, always like biting people.

date.TaskDes: 击败森林里这些笨拙的白熊，还镇民一个平安！
date.TaskDes_EN: Kill these clumsy white bears in the forest and bring peace to the people!

date.TaskDes: 找到击败怪物掉落的熊掌，你以为是食物？别想太多，这个可不能吃！
date.TaskDes_EN: Find the bear paw that killed the monster. Do you think it is food? Don't think too much, this can't be eaten!

date.TaskDes: 不失所望，终于在森林的深处找到了这只大怪兽，小菜一碟，刚好用我的新装备练练手。
date.TaskDes_EN: I'm not disappointed. I finally found this monster in the deep forest. It's a piece of cake. I just used my new equipment to practice.

date.TaskDes: 等级提升至9级后，开启后续主线任务。
date.TaskDes_EN: After upgrading to 9 levels, the main tasks will be opened.

date.TaskDes: 回到最开始的地方，告诉魔导师·加尔你这一路来的经历。
date.TaskDes_EN: Go back to the beginning and tell magistrix Jarl about your journey.

date.TaskDes: 路边站着一个白发苍苍的老婆婆，她吃过的盐比你吃过的饭还多，找她谈谈或许能得到什么线索。
date.TaskDes_EN: There is a white-haired old lady standing by the roadside. She has eaten more salt than you have eaten, so talk to her about what clues you might get.

date.TaskDes: 这些狼王的傀儡越来越猖獗了，经常残害来往路人，快去拯救一下大家吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: The puppets of these wolf kings are becoming more and more rampant, and they often mutilate passers-by, so go and save everyone.

date.TaskDes: 除掉森林深处的狼王，在哈兰婆婆面前证明自己的实力。
date.TaskDes_EN: Get rid of the wolf king deep in the forest and prove his strength in front of Grandma Haran.

date.TaskDes: 前往风之谷，听说那里有爷爷的消息。
date.TaskDes_EN: Go to the Wind Valley, I heard that there have Grandpa's message.

date.TaskDes: 周围有很多稀有的精灵龙，它们身上的灵龙翼可算是有价值的东西了。
date.TaskDes_EN: There are many rare faerie dragon around, and the spirit dragon wings on them can be regarded as valuable things.

date.TaskDes: 赶紧捡起这些灵龙翼，带回去好好研究研究。
date.TaskDes_EN: Quickly pick up these spirit dragon wings and take them home to study them.

date.TaskDes: 等级提升至10级后，开启后续主线任务。
date.TaskDes_EN: After rating raised to 10, the follow-up to open the main quest.

date.TaskDes: 看到那些透明瓶子了吗，那个应该能帮助你恢复体力。
date.TaskDes_EN: Do you see those transparent bottles? That one should help you recover.

date.TaskDes: 这些软泥怪似乎和普通的软泥怪不太一样，你要特别小心。
date.TaskDes_EN: These ooze seem to be different from ordinary ooze, you have to be very careful.

date.TaskDes: 捡起这些黏糊糊的东西。
终于找到了软泥怪猖狂的源头，在软泥控制者-麦尔的控制下，软泥怪肆意妄为，除掉这个万恶之源。
date.TaskDes_EN: Finally, I found the source of the ooze. Under the control of the slime controller-Maier, the ooze arbitrarily acted to remove this source of evil.

date.TaskDes: 等级提升至12级后，开启后续主线任务。
date.TaskDes_EN: After rating raised to 12, the follow-up to open the main quest.

date.TaskDes: 蕴藏着古魔法的神奇力量。
date.TaskDes_EN: It contains the magical power of ancient magic.

date.TaskDes: 罪恶之源的守护者卡雷斯，每一个侵犯它的人都将被它俘虏，祝你好运。
date.TaskDes_EN: Cares, the guardian of the source of sin, everyone who violates it will be captured by it, good luck.

date.TaskDes: 魔导师·加尔似乎有什么新的事情要向你交代….
date.TaskDes_EN: Magister Jarl seems to have something new to explain to you ...

date.TaskDes: 等级提升至15级后，开启后续主线任务。
date.TaskDes_EN: After rating raised to 15, the follow-up to open the main quest.

date.TaskDes: 万物繁盛，流浪共和，在风之谷的隐者始终站在高处悲悯这个世界。
date.TaskDes_EN: Everything is prosperous, the wandering republic, the hermit of the Valley of the Wind has always stood at a high place to pity this world.

date.TaskDes: 昔日古老的参天大树被施了暗黑魔法，似乎变得不那么友好。
date.TaskDes_EN: The old towering trees in the old days were enchanted with dark magic, and they seemed to be less friendly.

date.TaskDes: 物资总是那么匮乏……多捡些树皮吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: The supplies are always so scarce ... pick up more bark.

date.TaskDes: 终于打听到这个魔头的老窝了,我的小勇士,你一定要记住带齐帮手再过去！
date.TaskDes_EN: Finally, I heard about the devil's den, my little warrior, you must remember to bring Qi helper to go!

date.TaskDes: 天呐！没想到你真的把巴佛灭给击败了,快去告诉魔导师·加尔这个好消息吧
date.TaskDes_EN: God! Unexpectedly, you really defeated Baphomet, go and tell Magister Jarl this good news

date.TaskDes: 小仙女一定等不及再次看到我啦,赶紧去找他吧！快跑啊！
date.TaskDes_EN: The little fairy can't wait to see me again, hurry and find him! Run!

date.TaskDes: 嗯，等我收集齐3个勇士印记,我就能向他们证明，我也是个小勇士了！
date.TaskDes_EN: Well, when I collect the three warrior marks, I can prove to them that I am a little warrior too!

date.TaskDes: 海底世界位于古老的奇异深处，也是圣光大陆上最灿漫的明珠，它有着许多不为人知的存在。
date.TaskDes_EN: The underwater world is located in the ancient strange depth, and it is also the most brilliant pearl on the continent of the Holy Light. It has many unknown existences.

date.TaskDes: 隐居在沉船海滩的守护者，他好像无所期盼，只是静静地伫立在海底入口迎接着远方来的客人。
date.TaskDes_EN: The guardian who lives in seclusion on the shipwreck beach, he seems to have no expectation, but just stands quietly at the entrance of the seabed to welcome guests from afar.

date.TaskDes: 这艘沉船看上去也是年代久远了，可能要追溯回斯巴达那个时代吧...一些身着奇异服饰大腹便便的卫兵，竟也敢在这里胡作非为。
date.TaskDes_EN: This shipwreck also seems to be old, perhaps going back to the time of Sparta ... Some guards in bizarre costumes with big belly poops dare to do anything wrong here.

date.TaskDes: 卫兵们看着这么胆小想必是不敢私心伤害无辜的人，这背后肯定有其他力量在作祟！
date.TaskDes_EN: The guards looked so cowardly that they would not dare to hurt the innocent selfishly. There must be other forces behind them!

date.TaskDes: 从海底温润的泥土中诞生，蕴含一丝丝魔魂之力。
date.TaskDes_EN: Born from the warm mud of the seabed, it contains a trace of magical power.

date.TaskDes: 传说中沉船海滩上遍布梦境沼泽，其中生长着一种奇特而珍贵的材料，能制成极佳的药水。
date.TaskDes_EN: Legend has it that there are dream swamps all over the shipwreck beach, in which a strange and precious material grows, which can make an excellent potion.

date.TaskDes: 终于找到了卫兵身后的力量，强大的黑巫师将他们的神智刻上烙印以此操控他们，来者不善。
date.TaskDes_EN: Finally found the power behind the guards, the powerful dark wizards carved their sacred marks to control them, and the comers were not good.

date.TaskDes: 幽深的小道通往黑暗的深处，操控卫兵的黑巫师法琳娜就躲藏于此。
date.TaskDes_EN: The deep path leads to the depths of darkness, and the grand widow Faerlina, who controls the guard, hides here.

date.TaskDes: 吼..该死的入侵者，他们占据了我的故乡...我只是想在故乡结束我得一生...
date.TaskDes_EN: Roar .. damn invaders, they occupy my hometown ... I just want to end my life in my hometown ...

date.TaskDes: 听这个玩意儿的名字就知道很厉害的样子。
date.TaskDes_EN: Listen to the name of this thing and you will know how powerful it is.

date.TaskDes: 大自然总是能带给人惊喜，像这种蓝绿色的晶体总是一簇簇地生长在比海更深的地方。
date.TaskDes_EN: Nature always surprises people, and blue-green crystals like this always grow in clusters deeper than the sea.

date.TaskDes: 那些戴着红色帽子的魔法师们看起来不是很和善。
date.TaskDes_EN: The magicians wearing red hats don't look very kind.

date.TaskDes: 戴着蓝色帽子的那些家伙看起来似乎更厉害一些。
date.TaskDes_EN: Those guys wearing blue hats seem to be more powerful.

date.TaskDes: 到处都是棘手的小怪，别挡住了我的去路。
date.TaskDes_EN: Tricky little monsters everywhere, don't block my way.

date.TaskDes: 古魔法的经书里写着魔法之心可以洗练成任何你想要的东西，谁知道这是不是真的呢...
date.TaskDes_EN: The ancient magic scriptures say that the magical heart can be refined into anything you want, who knows if this is true ...

date.TaskDes: 你知道魔法之心有什么用处吗？
date.TaskDes_EN: Do you know what's the use of Magic Heart?

date.TaskDes: 噗，这些恶心的虫子让我浑身起满鸡皮疙瘩。
date.TaskDes_EN: Puff, these disgusting bugs made me goose bumps.

date.TaskDes: 趁这些蛋孵出大虫子之前把这些他们处理掉吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: Take care of these eggs before they hatch big bugs.

date.TaskDes: 卡达尔为了增强势力，居然把海底原本的礁石也幻化成他的守卫。
date.TaskDes_EN: In order to strengthen the power, Kadar actually turned the original reef on the seabed into his guard.

date.TaskDes: 不，我不想看到这些大个头朝我走过来，像是要从我身上碾压过去似的。
date.TaskDes_EN: No, I don’t want to see these big guys coming towards me, as if they are going to crush over me.

date.TaskDes: 真不知道这些石头有什么用处，难道用来生火？
date.TaskDes_EN: I really don't know what the purpose of these stones is, is it used to make fire?

date.TaskDes: 我以为巨石首领应该是浑身长满石头的家伙，就像海岸边的饱经侵蚀的礁石一样，令人费解。
date.TaskDes_EN: I thought the megalith leader should be a guy covered with stones, just like the eroded reefs on the coast, puzzling me.

date.TaskDes: 我不想再遇到刚刚那些令人反感的怪物了，他们可以让我免去今天的午餐。
date.TaskDes_EN: I don't want to meet those offensive monsters just now, they can save me from today's lunch.
The level is not enough, kill more monsters.

date.TaskDes: 小时候听爷爷说每个空间都有自己的守护者，很多人为了跻身领主的地位会不惜一切手段，不知道现在海底的领主又换成了谁，托雷也许知道。
date.TaskDes_EN: When I was a child, I heard that my grandfather said that every space has its own guardian. Many people will do whatever it takes to become the lord. I don’t know who the lord of the sea has changed to now. Thore may know.

date.TaskDes: 小小的石头蕴含大大的能量。
date.TaskDes_EN: The little stone contains great energy.

date.TaskDes: 不过是海度丝的一个傀儡罢了，不用放在心上。
date.TaskDes_EN: It's just a puppet of Hydross, don't worry about it.

date.TaskDes: 不打怪就不能提升等级，不提升等级就不能打赢Boss,不打赢Boss就没有奖励，没有奖励就不能给老婆买礼物，呜太难了。
date.TaskDes_EN: You can’t upgrade your level without fighting monsters, you can’t win Boss without upgrading your level, there is no reward if you don’t win Boss, and you can’t buy gifts for your wife without rewards.

date.TaskDes: 这个地方地形还真是出奇的复杂，找个人问问路吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: The terrain of this place is really surprisingly complicated. Find someone to ask for directions.

date.TaskDes: 他们手上扛着的是屠龙刀吗？我先去抓两个俘虏来问问看！
date.TaskDes_EN: Are they carrying the Dragon Sword? Let me first grab the two captives and ask!

date.TaskDes: 处理掉这最后几个大个头一切都快结束了。
date.TaskDes_EN: Dealing with the last few big guys is almost over.

date.TaskDes: 听说海度丝不是什么好惹的家伙，看来我需要增强我的战斗力。
date.TaskDes_EN: I heard that Hydross is not a messy guy, it seems that I need to increase my combat effectiveness.

date.TaskDes: 听托雷说海度丝原本是条善良的美人鱼，因为从小失去父母，误入歧途跟着法琳娜学习黑暗魔法，成为了她统治海底的工具。
date.TaskDes_EN: Listening to Thore said that Hydross was originally a kind mermaid, because she lost her parents since childhood and went astray to learn dark magic with Faerlina, becoming her tool to rule the seabed.

date.TaskDes: 我梦中的海好像又回来了，尘归尘，土归土，海度丝也应该和家人团聚了吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: The sea in my dream seems to be back again. The dust returns to the dust, and the soil returns to the earth. Hydross should reunite with his family.
There seems to be some concern in my heart ...

date.TaskDes: 这些海底碎片就好像小时候玩的卡片一样，收集了许多但总舍不得扔掉。
date.TaskDes_EN: These seabed debris are like cards played as a child, collected a lot but can't be thrown away.

date.TaskDes: 或许以后我也可以把这些海底徽记给我的孩子看：爸爸曾经也守护过这片美丽的海底世界。
date.TaskDes_EN: Maybe in the future I can also show these undersea insignia to my children: Dad used to protect this beautiful seabed world.

date.TaskDes: 一直没有爷爷的消息，想要继续追寻爷爷的足迹还是要变强！嗯！
date.TaskDes_EN: There has been no news of Grandpa. If you want to continue to follow Grandpa's footsteps, you still have to become stronger! Uh!

date.TaskDes: 接下来又有什么未知在等着我呢？
date.TaskDes_EN: What unknown is waiting for me next?

date.TaskDes: 这里还真是炎热难耐，像个烤炉，世界上竟还存在这样的地方，去找个人问问情况吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: It's really hot and unbearable. It's like an oven. There is such a place in the world. Go find someone to ask about the situation.

date.TaskDes: 这里温度太高生物很难生存，难怪这里的动物看起来都这么虎视眈眈。
date.TaskDes_EN: It's hard to survive here because the temperature is too high. It's no wonder that the animals here look so eye-catching.

date.TaskDes: 狗牙或许可以来做陷阱？
date.TaskDes_EN: Maybe dog teeth can be a trap?

date.TaskDes: 看看这些炽热的沙土，竟然还有残留的晨露，不可思议。
date.TaskDes_EN: Looking at these hot sand, there is still a morning dew left, incredible.

date.TaskDes: 原来世界上真的有木乃伊诶，这些大块头的家伙们是靠着什么才能行动如此敏捷，有人在控制他们？
date.TaskDes_EN: It turns out that there are really mummies in the world. What do these big guys rely on to act so agile, and someone is controlling them?

date.TaskDes: 这些沙漠碎片能卖钱吗？想换点水喝。
date.TaskDes_EN: Can these desert fragments sell? I want to change some water to drink.

date.TaskDes: 就是一条大龙而已，不也即将成为我的猎物。
date.TaskDes_EN: It ’s just a big dragon, and it ’s not about to become my sword.

date.TaskDes: 我听到你背包里装备碰撞发出的美妙声音了，换个装备打败两只怪物试试手。
date.TaskDes_EN: I heard the wonderful sound of the collision of equipment in your backpack. Try another equipment to kill two monsters.

date.TaskDes: 想必这里应该不只有我一个人来冒险吧，应该还有其他勇士，我去找找。
date.TaskDes_EN: Presumably, I am not the only one here to take risks, there should be other warriors, I look for it.

date.TaskDes: 咦，消灭这些奇怪的怪物。
date.TaskDes_EN: Hey, bloody big guys, these are the variants of the desert mummy, don't come to me at night, I worry about nightmares.

date.TaskDes: 灵木戎戎，繁霜峩峩。传说，灵木是以若干植物灵魂凝结而成最纯洁的灵魂。
date.TaskDes_EN: According to legend, the spirit tree is the purest soul condensed by several plant souls.

date.TaskDes: 不是天宫里掉下来的琉璃灯，是一种很好的材料。收集:沙漠碎片20个
date.TaskDes_EN: It is not a glazed lamp falling from the heavenly palace, it is a very good material. Collection: 20 Desert Debris

date.TaskDes: 雷姆斯是荒漠原始部落的酋长，他的力气是出了名的大，听说他一口气能吞下五个小孩，小心他的大斧子！。
date.TaskDes_EN: Reims is the chief of the desert primitive tribe, his strength is notoriously big, I heard that he can swallow five children in one breath, be careful of his big axe! .

date.TaskDes: 提升等级接受更高等级的挑战吧。
date.TaskDes_EN: After playing this vigorous monster, I am really a bit hungry. Kill a few monsters and eat them.

date.TaskDes: 沙漠里的地鼠想必也不是什么好地鼠。
date.TaskDes_EN: Shrewmouse in the desert must not be good shrewmouse.

date.TaskDes: 掉了什么东西，都捡起来吧，石头收集爱好者成就达成。
date.TaskDes_EN: Pick up anything you lost, and the stone collectors have achieved it.

date.TaskDes: 勇士说的守秘人究竟在哪里，究竟有什么秘密是荒漠勇士都不能甘告诉的呢，我倒要一探究竟。
date.TaskDes_EN: Where are the secret guards that the warriors say, and what secrets the desert explorer can't tell, I want to find out.

date.TaskDes: 如果被这些手上有着利爪的家伙袭击会毁容吗？
